channel.title: Cheez 80 monster drop help
channel.description: who can help, my monsters are sometimes droping and somethimes not:S anybody??[br][size=1]Posted at: September 28, 2006, 02:53:53 AM[/size][hr]anybody?

item.title: Cheez 80 monster drop help
item.dc:creator: @thijs_d thijs_d
item.description:
@thijs_d wrote:

[quote=“Thebeanie, post:2, topic:16465”]if ure having the problem i think u are

go into npc handler and find the drop u want

get rid of the npc ids after the first ones (delete from the first || to the bracket)

if i add the extra ones with the || npcid thing they dont drop so i have to make seperated ones for ea [/quote]ive done, still the problem, but i have discovered somthing new, the same with the food! maby the bulic proces??

Read full topic

item.title: Cheez 80 monster drop help

item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

if ure having the problem i think u are

go into npc handler and find the drop u want

get rid of the npc ids after the first ones (delete from the first || to the bracket)

if i add the extra ones with the || npcid thing they dont drop so i have to make seperated ones for ea
